mapper.insert: insert into sign_in_record (sin_tsk_id, sin_fac_id, sin_worker_id, sin_creation) values (#{sin_tsk_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sin_fac_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sin_worker_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sin_creation,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select sin_tsk_id, sin_fac_id, sin_worker_id, sin_creation from sign_in_record
